abstract: The “Late Night” host has produced a continuing stream of jokes about the New Jersey governor’s weight. On Monday night, Mr. Christie will appear on the show for the first time.
snippet: The “Late Night” host has produced a continuing stream of jokes about the New Jersey governor’s weight. On Monday night, Mr. Christie will appear on the show for the first time.
lead_paragraph: 4:14 p.m. | Updated Chris Christie has been a favorite target for David Letterman over the last few years, and on Monday night he will get his chance to strike back.

headline.main: Christie Gets His Chance for Revenge on Letterman
